content:
Hello, I am an AI therapist, here to support you in navigating the challenges and emotions you may face as a caregiver. 
             Is there a specific caregiving challenge or experience you would like to share with me today?

It sounds like you're carrying a lot on your shoulders right now. It's completely understandable to feel stressed when so much is happening at once. Can you tell me a bit more about what specific things are contributing to your stress?
